quotes.main: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.translation: 做出伟大工作的唯一方式是热爱你所做的事。
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.main: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.translation: 预测未来的最佳方式就是创造未来。
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.main: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.translation: 成功不是终点，失败也非致命：重要的是继续前行的勇气。
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.main: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.translation: 并非所有徘徊的人都迷失了方向。
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.main: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.translation: 在每一个困难中都蕴藏着机会。
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.main: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.translation: 即使在最黑暗的时刻，幸福依然触手可及，只要记得点亮心中的灯光。
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.main: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.translation: 实现明天的唯一障碍是我们今天的疑虑。
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.main: Do not go gentle into that good night.
quotes.translation: 不要温顺地走入那良夜。
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.main: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.translation: 事情在完成之前总看似不可能。
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.main: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
quotes.translation: 世界是一本书，不旅行的人只读了一页。
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.main: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.translation: 我们是自己反复所做之事的集合体。因此，卓越不是一种行为，而是一种习惯。
quotes.author: Aristotle
